version_description:
- Performance improvements you won't necessarily notice but definitely enhancing your experience with the app.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us!

This version addresses previous update issues. We apologize for inconveniencing the app users who were impacted by the bugs in version 2.8.

Thank you for your continued support and comments submitted by email! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us! Contact us at: support@apalon.com

- iPad Pro support. Get up right on time, enjoy your favorite wake up music and cool designer clock themes - now on your iPad Pro as well! The latest update has been optimized to work flawlessly on your new device!
- Relaxing nature sounds that will help you sleep better at night.
- Recommendations on the best time to go to bed depending on the time your morning alarm is set to. Wake up feeling rested! 
- Performance improvements you won't necessarily notice but definitely enhancing your experience with the app.

- We have a new feature - a handy timer tool! No matter whether you are cooking or working out, multifunctional timer will always be at hand!
- Performance improvements you won't necessarily notice but definitely enhancing your experience with the app.

Thank you for your continued support and feedback! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us!

- Performance and stability improvements for flawless work on iOS 10.

Thank you for your continued support and comments submitted by email! Don't hesitate to share your impressions and feedback with us via support@apalon.com

- Performance improvements you won't necessarily notice but definitely enhancing your experience with the app.

Thank you for your continued support and comments submitted by email! Don't hesitate to share your impressions and feedback with us via support@apalon.com

Alarm Clock for Me gets a revamped look and feel! With the latest update we introduce the vast improvements on every level:
* Completely revamped interface - access the alarms, sleep timers, timers and countdowns easier than ever
* Countdown - a brand new feature that helps you never miss an important date: count down to your vacation, anniversary, graduation and much more
* Never lose track of time! Now you can set not only multiple alarms but multiple timers, countdowns and sleep timers as well

This update:
- Introduces the option to choose a random song for an alarm
- Adds the ability to set the sleep timer for as long as 24 hours
- Contains numerous stability and performance improvements

Thank you for your continued support and comments submitted by email! We're committed to making the app even better, so never lose the drive to share your impressions and feedback with us! Contact us at: support@apalon.com

- Optimized for iPhone X!
- Performance and stability improvements for flawless work on iOS 11
- The app now supports Turkish, Thai, Vietnamese, Indonesian, Traditional Chinese, Polish, Norwegian and Danish languages
- Improved nightstand mode: enjoy new minimalistic look of your bedside clock

Thank you for your continued support and comments submitted by email! Don't hesitate to share your impressions and feedback with us via support@apalon.com

Say hello to brand-new features that will help you wake up right away and on time:

-From now on you can choose your own way to stop the alarm - shake your device or solve a math problem. Warning: perfect for heavy snoozers!
-Performance improvements you won't necessarily notice but definitely enhancing your experience with the app.

Thank you for your continuous support and comments! Do not hesitate to share your feedback with us via support@apalon.com.
